thread.title: At SJC Hearing, Leahy Urges Senators To Support Criminal Justice Reform (Patrick J Leahy)
thread.title_full: At SJC Hearing, Leahy Urges Senators To Support Criminal Justice Reform (Patrick J Leahy) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: At SJC Hearing, Leahy Urges Senators To Support Criminal Justice Reform (Patrick J Leahy)
text: ( Source : Patrick J Leahy ) 10.19.15 WASHINGTON (Monday, October 19 , 2015 ) - The Senate Judiciary Committee is holding a hearing today on the bipartisan Sentencing Reform and Corrections Act of 2015, a bill to reduce some mandatory sentences
